text:
is ensured.
AR 74. Directive (EU) 2022/2041 on adequate minimum wages in the European Union references both
indicative reference values commonly used at international level such as 60 % of the gross
median wage and 50 % of the gross average wage, and/or indicative reference values used
at national level. Data for the indicative values of 60% of the national median gross wage or
50% of the national average gross wage can be obtained from the European Labour Force
Survey.
